content: sunmelt shawlette this fingering-weight asymmetrical triangle shawlette is perfect for summer with calming garter stitch a contrasting cabled openwork core and edging reminiscent of the sun setting over flowing waves sunmelt shawlette 1 pattern by rachael huffman of moonvale creations this pattern is available for free and should not be sold yarn two contrasting fingering-weight definitions yarns one variegated mc 72g/250 yards bobble bind off and one solid cc 50g/175 yards c2b cable 2 back slip one st to cable i used color me happy pure merino fingering needle and hold to back k1 k1 from cable 3-ply fingering-weight yarn in autumn leaves needle and autumn sunset the original mill run for this fingering weight yarn was 100g/380 yards c4b cable 4 back slip two sts to cable per skein which is a bit thicker than typical needle and hold to back k2 k2 from cable fingering weight yarn this pattern will work well needle with any fingering weight yarn cc contrasting color needles us size 4 3 5mm circular needles on 44 /110cm cable co cast on note i am a loose knitter so adjust needle size k knit to fit your gauge however gauge is not important unless you have a limited amount of k2tog knit two together a right-leaning yarn decrease of one st finished dimensions kfb knit front and back of same st an approximately 60 152cm wide by 28 increase of one st 71cm tall at end after blocking gauge 4 5 sts and 7 row = 1 inch ktbl knit through back loop a twisted knit st notions a cable needle and a tapestry needle to weave in ends mc main color p purl techniques knitting purling increasing cabled stitches lace latvian rs right side front of work braid skp slip one st knitwise knit one st then pass slipped st over the knit st a left-leaning decrease of one st ssk slip 2 sts knitwise one at a time then knit these 2 sts together a left-leaning decrease of one st st s stitch/stitches ws wrong side back of work yo yarn over an increase of one st sunmelt shawlette 2 pattern by rachael huffman of moonvale creations this pattern is available for free and should not be sold using mc co 5 sts section 2 latvian braid note in this section there are no increases or section 1 evening sky decreases knit each row as it is written below row 1 rs k1 kfb k2tog k1 row 2 ws k to last 2 sts kfb k1 setup row rs *k1 with mc k1 with cc* row 3 k1 kfb k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 repeat from * to * until end of row row 4 k to last 2 sts kfb k1 pro tip your yarns will get very twisted in row 1 pull about 24 60cm of yarn out of each ball pro tip you may wish to place a removable prior to knitting row 1 so that the
